texts.name: Senirel
texts.biography: It's hard to tell if she's a human or a plant, but the mandrakes listen to her every word and take their cues from her..

specialty.description:
{Mandrakes and Mandragorum}

Increases Speed of any Mandrakes or Mandragorum by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Mandrakes
